characters.name: Ayame Kajou
characters.description: Ayame is the Vice-President of the Student Council and daughter of a disgraced former Diet member who unsuccessfully fought against the public morality laws. Ayame secretly acts outside of school as the perverted terrorist Blue Snow (also known as Blue Tundra), wearing panties over her face, spreading semi-pornographic leaflets, and shouting dirty jokes in defiance of the Japanese moral authorities. After kidnapping Tanukichi, she decides to form the group SOX with him and expand her activities to include the school.

characters.name: Anna Nishikinomiya
characters.description: Being the president of the Student Council and a daughter to her influential parents, whom are both responsible in enforcing the ever stricter public morality laws, Anna is a soft-spoken and innocent yet strong and determined girl whose role is to get rid any materials that are deemed obscene or lewd not just in the school, but also in the society as a whole.

characters.name: Otome Saotome
characters.description: Erotic illustrator for SOX, and double awarded painter who goes to Tokioka Academy with the rest of the main cast.

characters.name: Hyouka Fuwa
characters.description: Hyouka Fuwa is an "aspiring" scientist when it comes to "body-melding" (sex). She wishes to unlock the secrets of "body-melding" and to do so she preforms studies such as watching flies mate, and constantly harassing the main protagonist with questions. Overall Hyouka is a restless yet calm character who will go through any trouble to reveal the secrets of "body-melding."

characters.name: Oboro Tsukimigusa
characters.description:
A disciplinary committee member dispatched to guard Anna from harm and obscenities, however her sense of what is obscene or not is wildly off mark. She has a completely blank personality and is described as a "robot" by Anna's mother.

~!Tsukimigusa is actually a cross-dressing man.!~

characters.name: Raiki Gouriki
characters.description: Member of the Tokioka Academy Student Council.

characters.name: Keisuke  Onigashira
characters.description:
Father of Kosuri; ero-terrorist who made deals with the moral authorities, angering the other terrorist groups around Japan, as well as his own daughter.

(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Kosuri Onigashira
characters.description:
Daughter of Keisuke and a fangirl of SOX who carries multiple weapons and uses tactics she learned from romantic and shoujo manga to manipulate everyone, even her allies. Ayame lets her join in partly because her hairstyle looks similar to the tip of a penis, however her loyalty is questionable, she can be very manipulative often uses her charm to seduce boys and everyone around her were she can also be very domineering when she has them in her grip. Currently pretending to be Tanukichi's sister while hiding out at his apartment.

(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Base Black
characters.description:
An ero-terrorist who appears in the anime's last episode. He personally knew and worked alongside Zenjuro and planned to unlock a secret vault filled with erotic treasures using an artefact that was passed down to Tanukichi. He gathered the main cast to a resort via false invitations and challenged them to a duel for the artefact through Yakyuken. He noted on his satisfaction on how Tanukichi had grown up like his father before him when he departed.

(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Binkan
characters.description:
Binkan is just an innocent bystander who is often nearby whenever SOX performs another act of ero-terrorism, staring at their latest handiwork. She is hardly acknowledged by the main characters until the final episode where it is shown that she is a prefect in training under the leadership of Oboro. Binkan's real name is never mentioned; her nickname roughly translates to "little sensitive (girl)."
(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Takuma Ichinose
characters.description:
Ero-terrorist who wraps himself in panties and is obsessed with underwear, having his own concepts of what is considered the best type of underwear. A "high-class pervert" who leads the group "Gathered Fabric" to steal all kinds of undergarments across Japan, he ends up clashing against SOX because Ayame believes him to be ruining the group's reputation by performing terrorist acts such as hijacking public transportation under the claim that Gathered Fabric is an ally of SOX. Ayame eventually confronts him, saying that she only wants to protest against the anti-profanity laws, not actively target the Japanese authorities.
(Source: Wikipedia)

characters.name: Sophia Nishikinomiya
characters.description:
Anna's mother who is behind a push for even-stricter public morality laws than the currently enacted ones, in order to create an ideal world that poses virtually no threat to Anna's chastity.
(Source: Wikipedia)
